import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Dish, Review } from '../app.component'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-one-dish', templateUrl: './one-dish.component.html', styleUrls: ['./one-dish.component.css'] }) export class OneDishComponent { public id: string; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) {} dish:Dish getReviews: Function; reviews: Review[]; // @Input() callbackRequest:any;; public callbackRequest: any;; ngOnInit(){ let i = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); console.log(i) // this.callbackRequest.subscribe((res:Dish)=>{ // console.log(res); // }) let fun = this.callbackRequest(1) fun.subscribe((res:Dish)=>{ console.log(res); this.dish = res; }) let fun1 = this.getReviews(i); fun1.subscribe((res:Review[])=>{ this.reviews = res; }) } addReview(){ } }
